review: A good device for the $20 I paid but not worth the $40. I have had issue as have others with resolution. I primarily bought this to use in conjunction with Plex and to be honest I haven't determined if the issue is related to the Plex app or the fire stick. All I know is that the video quality from streaming on the local network is no where near as good as the Chromecast I purchased a year ago.
